title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: Up for auction are 3x Mystery Envelope #1 released by Polymerbit in December 2018#CH-06, #CH-07, #CH-09Each envelope is sealed, signed on the back by the maker, and contains a special 2 mbtc triangle note.This is the only one of it's kind produced by PolymerbitSince these envelopes are sealed, I had to borrow pictures of the note from this post:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5083990.msg48790132#msg48790132(Thank you to ThatRandomDude)***Bids will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-item auctions. Place the number of items you want to bid on and then the bid per item:     1 @ xx btc, 2 @ xx btc, 3 @ xx btc.  Winners will chose note number in order of winning***STARTING BID PER NOTE: 0.0005BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER NOTE: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: SEPTEMBER 22nd, 2022, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending timeIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: is there a way to fund these nice notes?i see a hologram (which must be hiding the private key) but i don't see a BTC address or a qr-code for this where i should send the 2mBTC

comments.author: minerjones
comments.created_time: September 17, 2022, 09:34:40 PMLast edit: September 18, 2022, 12:16:07 AM by minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on September 17, 2022, 09:27:07 PMis there a way to fund these nice notes?i see a hologram (which must be hiding the private key) but i don't see a BTC address or a qr-code for this where i should send the 2mBTC No, they were produced as concept notes.It is a little blurry, but the bottom right corner of the back of the note reads:"This is a concept note without keys""This note is not loaded"

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Suzuki Matt on September 17, 2022, 10:32:21 PM1@ 0.0006Quote from: PeakDK on September 17, 2022, 10:25:06 PM2 @ 0.0005 btc Current high bids.Please note.. there are not separate lots.. you are just bidding on the number of notes you want and the bid per note.Do not need to make separate bid for each note.And reminder that bid are limited to 4 decimal places.Bids below do not count:Quote from: XYZo on September 18, 2022, 02:29:41 AM1 @ 0.00065 btc 2 @ 0.00055 btc 3 @ 0.00055 btc
